nodes.bodyText: When is this exception raised? If I see correctly it is not cought anywhere. That means your binding will crash if it is raised.

The exception will be thrown if the webthing does not support a web socket uri (which should). I have changed the exception type to IOException which will be handled inside the WebThingHandler class. Thanks for the hint
The features.xml don't need a license header.
